{"name": "Community Outreach and Development Center CDC (Community Nonprofit Network) ", "alternate_name": "", "description": "*REMINDER ... It may not look like it but WE ARE OPEN!
Our Capitol Heights office is a bit of a construction zone at the moment, but we are operating as normal, from 9am-5pm Monday through Friday.
Thank you for your patience and your understanding.
We look forward to seeing you and serving you!", "email": "", "url": "https://www.communityoutreachcdc.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4719 Marlboro Pike", "address_2": null, "city": "Capitol Heights", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20743", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.8734668, "longitude": -76.9328151}, "phones": [{"number": "(301) 735-0121", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No ID is required."}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Walk-ins accepted"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "SNAP assistance available"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on the first Tuesday of the month"}]}
